Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Dutchess to offer an optional twenty-five year retirement plan to certain deputy sheriffs employed by such county
Summary: Authorizes the county of Dutchess to offer an optional twenty-five year retirement plan to certain deputy sheriffs employed by such county.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the county of Dutchess to offer an optional twenty-five year retirement plan to certain deputy sheriffs employed by such county
